alert.note: Alert for Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 7:57PM CST until March 17 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...Arkansas... Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, In Mississippi, Lake Road in Nel-Win Camp is flooding. Fields on Fox Island are flooding. In Arkansas, road from the levee to the sport shooting camp west of Harrah`s Casino is covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 31.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM CST Thursday was 31.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
